website_summaries.verdict: With a faster processor and better networking than its predecessor, the Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ is so much more than a $35 computer if you're comfortable running Linux and tinkering with hardware.
cons: Ethernet port can't reach theoretical maximum speed of 1Gbps
Heat problems under heavy computing loads

customer_reviews.title: Addition of dual wifi makes this model top
customer_reviews.text: With the onboard wifi and 1.4ghz cpu makes this a totally versatile processor board. Took nearly a week to get here from germany?. I would of expected a lot quicker coming from uk based RS COMPONENTS. Remotely operating the pi from a windows machine via VNC is a doddle. Especially when little tweaks in python programs are required without keybrd and monitor. Edit..Failed few hours later, found unsolded joints. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rix.Lumb

customer_reviews.title: Used as telescope mount controller.
customer_reviews.text: Put a specially writted os (stellarmate) on it. Has replaced a laptop as a telescope controller. Still not pushed it to its limits as early days, but so far works well. Also recomend case and fast 32gb sandisk micro sd card.
customer_reviews.author: MR. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great device for emulation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board to emulate nes snes mega drive and the occasional ps1 game but n64 won't really work well. I did find you need heat sinks or a fan to help cool it down it does get hot and if it does it takes forever to update or program stuff and get the correct power cable other wise it will have a icon flashing on the screen and can damage the unit
customer_reviews.author: valomatters

customer_reviews.title: Fast hot pi
customer_reviews.text: As with all the Raspberry SOC computers this is a handy gadget. The latest desktop and stretch operating system are a big improvement. Still not a true windows pc replacement - but it only costs £35. Great for browsing and email when on the wall behind a large screen TV. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Value for money. For me it’s the next step on to combine with esp8266 and arduino. At present am using it to stream video from internet and display on tv. Can be controlled by iPad or iPhone after setting up with VNC viewer and connect.
customer_reviews.author: R G Bargey

customer_reviews.title: Latest & Greatest Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: The best Raspberry Pi model available today - if you're looking to get involved with the scene, get this. There is so much which you can do with this tiny £35 computer. I appreciate that the team keep improving the hardware in each iteration and still manage to keep the price the same.
customer_reviews.author: wiggya1

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the "experimenter"
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. An understanding of Linux types of OS will help bur things like interfacing serial ports takes more understanding
customer_reviews.author: varadero

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use as home automation system and works great. Takes time to setup but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ku3a

customer_reviews.title: Worked first time!
customer_reviews.text: A nubie at Pi's, but even though 75 found it easy to get it going...Now to build a data storage box!
customer_reviews.author: dunk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very eazy to install and configure. I installed OctoPrint and I am using it for controling my 3d printer remotly.
customer_reviews.author: Milos Dalmacija

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more to say. It works and is as expected. Buy one
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Latest Raspberry Pi
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the first Raspberry Pi 3B, so bought another one to build more projects
customer_reviews.author: John Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy as Pi , a very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for money , a very well constructed and solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: Old Bob

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Planning a moon landing with it. And some bitcoin mining!
customer_reviews.author: JIm Warrilow

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Work very well and easy to install. Finaly i'm happy with my Raspberry Pi project.
customer_reviews.author: Galin Georgiev

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 2 sadly when i received them one did not work out off the box and the other has also now stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Hamill

customer_reviews.title: It was a bargain
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at a bargain price so i snapped it up. Slightly better than the PI 3 B with ability for POE, dual band Wifi and faster CPU. A heatsink is recommended as it gets hot quick. One thing though : it’s supplied without an antistatic bag so it’s likely to rattle around a lot in its box during delivery :
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Raspberry Pi 3BPLUS
customer_reviews.text: its a raspberry pi what can u say does what u want it to do
customer_reviews.author: peter n smith

product_meta.title: Raspberry Pi 3BPLUS-R 1.4 GHz 1 GB RAM 64-Bit Quad Core Processor Single Board Computer - Green
product_meta.description:
Style Name:SingleRASPBERRY PI 3 MODEL B+
1.4GHz 64-bit quad-core processor, dual-band wireless LAN, Bluetooth 4.2/BLE, faster Ethernet, and Power-over-Ethernet support (with separate PoE HAT) Processor 
-Processor frequency: 1.4 MHz
-Processor model: BCM2837B0
-64-bit computing: Y

Memory 
-Maximum internal memory: 1 GB
-Internal memory type: LPDDR2 SDRAM
-Compatible memory cards: MicroSD (TransFlash)

Ports & interfaces 
-Wi-Fi: Y
-Ethernet LAN: Y
-USB version: 2.0
-USB ports quantity: 4
-Wi-Fi standards: IEEE 802.11ac,IEEE 802.11b,IEEE 802.11g,IEEE 802.11n
-Ethernet interface type: Gigabit Ethernet
-Audio port type: 3.5mm
-Bluetooth: Y
-Headphone out: Y
-Bluetooth version: 4.2 BLE
-HDMI ports quantity: 1
-MPI DSI interface: Y
-MPI CSI interface: Y

Features 
-Form factor: System on Module
-DC input voltage: 5 V

BOX CONTAINS
Raspberry Pi
feature_bullets: Supports Poe Network via Ethernet power supply
The Wi-Fi receiver will be 5 GHz
